net.librec.data

Interface DataSplitter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataSplitter, GivenNDataSplitter, GivenTestSetDataSplitter, KCVDataSplitter, LOOCVDataSplitter, RatioDataSplitter

    public interface DataSplitter
    A DataSplitter is an interface to split input data.
    Author:
    WangYuFeng

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • splitData

        void splitData()
               throws LibrecException
        Split the data.
        Throws:

        Set the data convertor of this splitter.

        Get train data.
